title: Nelson and Winnie Mandela
description: A quick win: understand Nelson and Winnie Mandela.

buildup.text: Nelson and Winnie Mandela married in 1958. Within five years, he was imprisoned. She became the face of resistance.

discovery.text: Their prison letters are among the most moving documents of the 20th century â€” love letters from behind bars.

twist.text: After his release, they divorced. The trauma of 27 years apart had changed them both irrevocably.

climax.text: Their love fueled a revolution even when it couldn't sustain a marriage. Some bonds serve a purpose beyond themselves.

punchline.text: The Mandelas' love survived apartheid but not 27 years apart. Both are true.
